content:
The soldiers of the Kamianets-Podilskyi engineering brigade from the UR-77 "meteorite" settings struck the accumulation of the enemy's living power.

The Armed Forces reports about it, reports the army.

Explosives weighing more than 700 kg completely defeated the enemy in the Eastern direction.

Earlier the Armyinformreported26 enemy attacks were reflected in the Avdiivsky direction.
title: "Meteor shower" weighing more than 700 kg: the Defense Forces hit the concentration of the occupiers
description: The Armed Forces reports about it, reports the army. An explosive weighing over 700kg ...
author: Army Inform
